entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to a few rain showers and wet flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm except 25 cm near the mountains. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries and risk of hail. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
